HEADLINE: TTimeManager
PARAGRAPH: Welcome to Transition Technologies service for time management service.
EARLIER_THAN_START: Start must be earlier than the end
COLLISION_TIMES: Collision of the times! Remove collisions and add new ones.
SET_DEFAULT_TEMPLATE: {{ name }} is now your new default template!
DELETE_TEMPLATE_PER: Are you sure you want to delete the selected template? It will be permanently deleted!
CHOOSE_USER: Start typing to get a list of possible matches
PRIVATE_TEAM: Only added users can see this team
TEAM_LEADER: is the owner of this team.
DELETE_TEAM_PER: Are you sure you want to delete selected team? It will be permanently deleted!
LAST_ADMIN_ERROR: It's a last person with admin privileges in this group. Give permission to someone else and try again!
PERMISSION_ERROR: You have no permission to do this!
DELETE_TEAM_ERROR: An unexpected problem occurred. The deletion operation failed
SET_DEFAULT_TEAM: {{ name }} is now your new default team!
EDIT_TEAM_WARNING: You have not made any changes!
TOO_MANY_TEAMS: You have created too many teams! Remove one of the teams and then try again!
NO_ONE: The team does not include other people
VALIDATION_ERROR: Form validation error! Fill in all fields!
UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown error! Please contact with technical support
LEAVE_TEAM_ERROR: You are last person with admin privileges in this group. Give permission to someone else and try again!
LEAVE_TEAM_ADMIN_ERROR: You are the owner of this team! You can not leave him!
FOLLOW_TEAM_SUCCESS: You are now following a new team {{ name }}!
COOKIE_MESSAGE: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
LIST_OF_PROJECTS: The list of projects is intact
WELCOME_FIRST_LOGIN: It seems like it is your first login to app!
WELCOME_TEMPLATES: A good place to start using the app is by creating a template with the hours that you're usually at work. Templates can be used to set a schedule for entire week with just one click! You can also set your schedule manually, if it is a one-time change that doesn't need to included in a template.
WELCOME_TEMPLATES_DEFAULT: It is also recommended to set one of your template as default. Then your schedule will be automatically set according to the template. If that happens, you will be informed via an e-mail - this feature can be disabled in profile settings.
WELCOME_TEAMS: If you are a member of a team, you can view other members' schedules by clicking their name & surname in the correct group in the sidebar. Alternatively you can see the schedule for all of the members by clicking on the team's name. If you are not part of any team, you can create one in the team view. Public teams can also be followed, so that they will be displayed in the sidebar too.
WELCOME_TEAMS_DEFAULT: One of the teams can be your default team. The default team is always displayed at the top of the sidebar, but also you will be automatically redirected to the schedule of that team after launching the application.
REPORTS_UPLOAD_ERROR: An error occured while sending the report! Check, if you sent a valid report file and try again.
REPORTS_QUERY_ERROR: An error occured while downloading reports! Try again later.
